name: s2cl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)))

stmt.origin: s2cld(c0, c2, c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cs2(c0, c2), cword(c1)))

comment: A doubleton word is a word. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
